name: Shipwreckd
description:
This project was written using the Bevy framework in Rust, mainly aimed at improving my knowledge of Rust and building for WASM. It's pretty basic but was a lot of fun to write, and I learnt a lot.

ShipWreckd

Controls: WASD to move

In ShipWreckd, you are a sailor whose ship has been smashed to smithereens in a mighty storm. 

Your task is to use your trusty rowing boat to explore the nearby islands and collect all the wood on them, so that you will be able to rebuild your boat.

You may only get out of your boat by landing on a beach (yellow) tile and you may only get in your boat by stepping onto a beach tile from a land tile. In short, you may only transition between sea (blue) and land (green) via a beach.

The aim of the game is to collect all the wood tiles on the map as quickly as possible. Keep playing and try to beat your own record!
